name: Nest
description: Nest is a minimalist investment insights platform designed to help long-term investors understand and visualize their financial growth. With elegant charts, personalized projections, and a clear, intuitive interface, Nest empowers users to invest with purpose and stay focused on their long-term goals.

name: Duordle
description: Duordle is an online game inspired by Wordle, offering a cooperative word-guessing experience. Built with React, Node.js, and TypeScript, it uses Socket.io for real-time gameplay and Tailwind CSS for responsive design.

name: GPTerminal
description: GPTerminal is a CLI tool for interacting with OpenAIâ€™s GPT directly from the terminal. It supports real-time conversations, configurable system prompts, and simple management of API keys. Designed for Linux and macOS.

name: Chat Room
description: A real-time chat app with user authentication, MongoDB-backed message storage, room join/leave functionality, and typing indicators for 1-on-1 messaging. Sessions are managed with Local Storage, and all schemas include proper validation.

name: .dotfiles
description: A personal collection of dotfiles to help set up and maintain a consistent development environment across systems. This includes configurations for my terminal, editor, window management, and more. Primarily tailored for macOS environments.

name: Portfolio Website
description: This is my portfolio website built using Typescript, React (Vite), styled with Tailwind CSS, and hosted with Render. The site is designed to showcase my projects, skills, and experiences.

name: Miscellaneous Projects
description: Repository for my miscellaneous code, pet projects, or just code that doesn't fit into specific categories or projects.
